question:
National Data Bank (NDB):
1. has been established on the basis of Sachar Committee Recommendations
2. has data pertaining to various aspects of socio-economic life of population falling in different social/religious categories
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: NDB has been set up in the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation and has data on social groups and religion collected in the Population Census and National Sample Surveys. 97 tables on population (Census 2001 and Census 2011) have been uploaded on the website of the MOSPI. [India Year Book 2015]
